body.name: Furologee 71" White L Shaped Gaming Desk with LED Lights and Power Outlets, Reversible Computer Corner Desk with File Drawer and Shelves, Large Home Office Desk with Pegboard and Monitor Stand
features: [Large 71" L Shaped Desk with LEDLights]: The white l gaming desk is built-in RGB LED lighting allowing you to adjust colors and brightness through the remote control according to your own needs, making you feel more gaming atmosphere.

[L Desk with Charging Station]: The l shaped computer desk built-in power outlets includes 3-AC power outlets and 2 USB charging ports for your phone, Bluetooth, headset, tablet, power bank, and gaming gear with fast charging, which provides great convenience to your life when you are working or playing games.

[Large L Desk with Hutch and Pegboard]: The white corner desk comes with hutch and 2-teir bookcase can place files, books, plants, leaving spacious space for working, writing, gaming; 45.3" long pedboard with 4 S headphone hooks for your photos or small itmes.

[L Office Desk with Fabric File Cabinet]: The white l desk is equiped with a fabric drawer and file cabinet, it could be put in letter/A4 size files to prevent documents from falling into dust; placing printers, scanners or other office machines, keeps its within easy reach of desk.

[Reversible L Gaming Desk with Shelf]: The l gaming desk with 3 storage shelves which can be fix on the left or right side of the l desk according to your preferences; 2 tier shelf for place your small items, large open shelf place your host to meet your different usage needs.

[43.3" Long Stand]: The size of the monitor stand is 43.3"*7.8", it can meet your requirements for placing 2 monitors. The monitor shelf can easily raise the screen to the level parallel to the eyes, promote good posture, more ergonomic design, and effectively reduce the pressure on the neck and back.

[Easy to Assemble and Satisfying Service]: L desk size: 70.86"*(18.89+11.81)"*29.53"Crafted of E1 MDF board and metal frame to ensure the l desk's strength and durability, which is waterproof and anti-scratch, very easy to clean; All necessary hardware & tools included. Any quality problems like arrives damaged, scratched or missing parts, please contact us, our experienced customer service teamwill provide you with satisfactory solutions within 24 hours ASAP.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought this on a whim after being tenured full time for my remote seasonal job. My original desk was very deep, but did not allow for my chair to move really. I was very much trapped. I got this @ $139 - $20 Amazon coupon. For the amount of desk you get, totally worth it.The drawers are indeed fabric but very sturdy.I recommend a two way driver to assemble, something with a snub nose. Many of the screws are going into particle board via predrilled pilot holes and I imagine trying to put this together with the included Allan wrenches would be rather tedious.I assembled it during work and because I'm an idiot, I started building it opposite to how I actually needed it and had to take it apart several times. However, the instructions are actually really clear and easy to follow (even though the word lights is misspelled on the box, which made me nervous about the instructions) I'm just an idiot with an inability to visualize and a lack of recognition of left and right.I say all that to say if you need a desk and this is all you can afford, you could do much much much worse.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 14, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I selected this desk for my son’s bedroom. It is a nice large desk, and fits in his space well. He loves the option of adding the LED lights, and thinks the flexibility of all the different shelves are cool for storing his tech stuff.It was generally easy to put together, and the instructions were fairly clear. There were a few pieces that were difficult to put together, so be sure to leave hardware loose when wedging in pieces. This desk took approximately 2 hours for a teenage boy to assemble. The bottom drawer has slides to accommodate files.The construction feels solid, and I like that the top shelf can be put in different positions to accommodate large monitors. Overall I am very happy with the quality of this desk, and I think my son will be using it for many years.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars It was good up until I seen the crack in the board
reviews.reviewText: Took me a long time to assemble. When I got almost done. I figured out that one of the boards was cracked. I tried to place that board on top and the holes of the board does not match the holes to the rods that it needs to connect to.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars easy to assemble
reviews.reviewText: It's a really good desk! it came a day early, so that's awesome. its fairly sturdy and easy to put together, coming with everything you need to set it up! it looks so cool in my room.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to put together
reviews.reviewText: This was very easy to put together and is a sturdy desk. I work from home and this has made working so much more aesthetically pleasing and functional!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Well designed reasonable quality
reviews.reviewText: Really like the design of the desk, overall it was heftier then expected which I guess reflects that it is a bit more robust then I was initially expecting. Like with most flat pack containers plenty of assembly is required.The overall desk design was highly functional and the shelves and LEDs were both better then expected. I have been using the desk for a few weeks and really have no complaints, I definitely am not using as a nerd gaming desk but the extra shelves and varying sized areas have been surprisingly useful. I really cant complain about either my computer setup or my reference peripherals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really good looking desk setup
reviews.reviewText: I really like how good looking this is. It's got all sorts of nice little areas to put stuff. It was easy to put together because the instructions were clear and easy to follow which is such a bonus. If you know what I mean it's very sturdy and good looking. I'm very happy with it. Glad I got it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The holes don’t line up. The screws are a mess. One side is too short.
